code:
%% Integrated Proposal - Policy View
graph TD
  %% Governance / Policy
  G0[Education_ClassroomService]
  G1[Education_LMS_Portal]
  G2[Education_LMS_Portal]

  %% CLEAR Core
  subgraph CORE[Education_ContentCDN]
    direction LR
    KMS[Education_GradeSync]
    MQ[Education_StudentDB]
    WN[Education_LMS_Portal]
    DB[Education_StudentDB]
    MET[Education_LMS_Portal]
    KMS-->MQ-->WN-->DB-->MET
  end

  %% Edge / Municipal
  subgraph EDGE[Education_ContentCDN]
    direction TB
    W1[Education_ContentCDN]
    W2[Education_ContentCDN]
  end

  %% AI / Audit
  subgraph AI[Education_StudentDB]
    A1[Education_StudentDB]
    A2[Education_ContentCDN]
  end

  %% Flows
  G1-- "決済依頼（バーチャルデビット/トークン認証）" -->G2
  G2-- "Txイベント（When/Who/Whom/Coin/Value）" -->EDGE
  EDGE-- "Witnessログ送信（非同期）" -->CORE
  CORE-- "整合証跡（Merkle Root / 署名）" -->G0
  AI-- "AI結果の監査証跡付与" -->CORE
  G0-- "方針・KPI（E-MAD）" -->MET
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
